text: Iolanda Nanni (29 November 1968 – 27 August 2018) was an Italian politician for Five Star Movement. Nanni graduated from the classical high school, before becoming a politician she worked as an employee in a private company. In the regional elections in Lombardy in 2013 she was elected Regional Councilor, among the ranks of the 5 Star Movement in the Province of Pavia.IL CONSIGLIERE In January 2018 she decided to run for the 2018 parliamentary elections in the Chamber of Deputies despite being ill.Nanni sfida la malattia: «Ho deciso: mi candido» M5s dà il via libera, Iolanda Nanni corre per il Parlamento She was elected to the Chamber in its constituency with 21.88% of the votes.Elezioni 2018: Centinaio, Cattaneo, Lucchini eletti nell'uninominale, Nanni alla camera col proporzionale eletto anche Romaniello. "Ripescati" Ferrari e Maggioni, fra i partiti successo per la coalizione di centrodestra She had been diagnosed with cancer and died on 27 August 2018 at the age of 49.Morta deputata M5s Iolanda Nanni. Di Maio: 'Ha lottato fino alla fine, lascia grande vuoto' Valentina Barzotti took her place in the Chamber. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:2018 deaths Category:21st-century Italian women politicians Category:Five Star Movement politicians Category:People from Pavia Category:Women legislators in Italy Category:Deputies of Legislature XVIII of Italy Category:Deaths from cancer in Italy
title: Iolanda Nanni
